comment: The beautiful website made me want to use SimpleCloud right away. The cloud is really user-friendly. The dashboard is cool too. I can easily integrate the API into my systems. Great thing, I'll recommend it!
The cloud is really simple and user-friendly to use. You can do a lot with the API and it is relatively simple. I think the new cli is particularly good and innovative.
SimpleCloud just lives up to it's name, it's really simple but also has a lot of features. I like how modular the cloud is built.
